record.description: Pre-military physical conditioning work for freshman at Stagg Field, University of Chicago. Left to right: Earl Shanker, 21, E.F. Beyer, Physical Instructor, Courtney Shanker (brother of Earl Shanker) scaling the top, with freshman looking on. Courtney regains his feet and tackles tank trap while his running mates go over the top and get set for a running leap off the other side of the trap.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Part of attached news clipping, fuzzy material on back, paint on surface.
